short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically plays the next video on YouTube Shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Got the attention span of a 5 year old but couldn't be bothered scrolling for each short? 

use this extension to have your YouTube shorts scroll automatically at the end of shorts and in ads.
